DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine whether livelihood intervention improve economic psychosocial wellbeing rural Uganda .
DOC.brief_title: A Livelihood Intervention Impoverished Women Rural Uganda
DOC.criteria: Women age 1860 year ( emancipated minor age 1617 year ) live least one child age 5 household Women age 1860 year ( emancipated minor age 1617 year ) agree participate livelihood intervention train program Women age 1860 year ( emancipated minor age 1617 year ) agree participate study data collection Men Women live Nyakabare Parish Women 18 year age ( emancipated minor ) older 60 year age Women live least one child age 5 household Women decline participate livelihood intervention train program Women decline participate study data collection Women live household another study participant
